model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
How was your trip? Did your daughter like that place?
Yes she loved it!  It was a great weekend. Have you done much camping?
I have done a little camping and would like to do more in the future. What is one of your favorite places to camp?
I like Manitoba. Do you camp in a tent or Yurt, cabin or camper trailer?
I've only camped in a tent so far, but would like to try out a camper trailer. What do use for camping?
We usually do tents but we have camped in yurts too. Did you go to the zoo last weekend?
I see. Yes, I did make it to the zoo.  Have you gone to your local zoo?
I went to the Bronx zoo it was amazing! Did you get to see Joshua?
I think the Bronx Zoo is one of the best in the country.   Yes, I did see Joshua.  Did you use a season pass for the zoo or just a one time ticket?

[MEMORY]
Related Evidences: (1) {'Related Topics': 'visiting the zoo', 'Related Summaries': 'Discussion about visiting the zoo and recommendations for animal enclosures.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Speaker A: That's good. I just got to america and don't know any places. ### Speaker A: Most major cities have a good zoo and kids love them. I don't know all the names.' }(2) {'Related Topics': 'planning a zoo trip', 'Related Summaries': 'Planning a zoo trip, discussing favorite animals, and family bonding.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Speaker B: Ugh, fine. We'll talk about something else. Have you been to the zoo at all lately? ### Speaker A: You know I go to the zoo on a weekly basis.It is my thing.Did you get a hobby after your divorce? ### Speaker B: Not really. Don't have the time, between work and childcare. My kid really wants to go to the zoo, what animal enclosures would you recommend we make a priority? ### Speaker A: Nothing beats the Tigers!! They are just gorgeous. The monkeys are funny.' }
